name: XENO.TEST
description:
XENO.TEST

You have 20 seconds to prove you're not human.

A minimalist cyberpunk comedy.

AI has taken over. Xeno run rampant. Earth is at peace. Humans are thought to be extinct. But they are not all gone, no. You are one of the last humans that remain, aren't you? You stay undercover the best you can, but you get caught unawares...

Over a dozen questions to test whether or not you're human. Replay it to answer all of the questions. Questions and answer orders are random.

Controls
  • Keyboard: J, Z, Enter, Space to confirm; WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Gamepad: A to confirm, d-pad or analog stick to move

Hidden hotkeys:

  • m: mute
  • f: fullscreen (desktop only)
Changelog
  • v1.2 - 2022-11-30
    • Skip intro text on replay
    • Display score at the end
    • Add 2 new questions
    • Pause music on focus lost
  • v1.1 - 2022-11-29
    • Performance improvements
  • v1.0 - 2022-11-29
    • Initial release
Credits

A prototype made by Brett Chalupa for 20 Second Game Jam.

Programmed with DragonRuby Game Toolkit. Art made with Aseprite. Music made with 1BitDragon. Sound effects made with jsfxr. Type set in Atkison Hyperlegible.

XENO.TEST is free software in the public domain. Its code is open source, licensed under the Unlicense and its assets are CC0.

XENO.TEST by Brett Chalupa is marked with CC0 1.0
